channel.title: Requesting some assistance for Delta-Base
channel.description:
I am trying to make Pking fair. But mages can attack from anywhere, how do I make it so they can only attack 8 spaces away from the enemy?
I already tried adding things to the resetAttack(); in the range portion, but it wont work...help?
